sectionedDescription/access: Guests have full access to the property except for one supply closet that is kept locked in the kitchen. While outdoors, we ask that you take care to not disturb the moss yard. The waterfall adjacent to the cabin is in Daniel Boone National Forest. Please note that there are cliffs, uneven ground and slippery rocks around the property. We do not recommend that children roam on their own. By booking, you agree that we are not responsible for any injuries that may occur.
sectionedDescription/description:
Unwind at this peaceful and private oasis in the heart of Daniel Boone National Forest. Enjoy relaxing and exploring on and around the property or take a short drive to experience the best of Red River Gorge and Cave Run Lake. Take in the waterfall view on the front porch while you enjoy your morning coffee or be lulled to sleep by the sounds of cascading water at night. Perfect for a romantic getaway or a weekend with friends.

Our kitchen cabinets are stocked with essential cookware including pots, pans, dishes, glassware, silverware, baking sheets and dishes and more. Appliances include a fridge, oven  and Keurig coffee maker that can make both single cups and a whole pot. The dining table in the kitchen seats 6. 

There are two bedrooms with one queen bed each. There is a pull out couch in the living room and we also have an air mattress for use. Please let us know ahead of your stay if you will need to use the pull out couch or air mattress so that we can supply bedding. The cabin has one bathroom.

Guests have full access to the property except for one supply closet that is kept locked in the kitchen. While outdoors, we ask that you take care to not disturb the moss yard. The waterfall adjacent to the cabin is in Daniel Boone National Forest. Please note that there are cliffs, uneven ground and slippery rocks around the property. We do not recommend that children roam on their own. By booking, you agree that we are not responsible for any injuries that may occur.

We live next door to the cabin and are happy to interact with you as much or as little as you would like! Feel free to stop by, call or send us a message if you need anything!

Please keep in mind that this is a very rural area. There is little to no cell phone service.  On your drive in, say hi to the yaks at Zhi-ba Shin-ga Yak Farm, the largest yak ranch east of the Mississippi! During your stay, you may be visited by our neighbor’s dogs. They may bark (stranger danger) but are very sweet. 

Distance from:
Sunset Ridge Farm Wedding Venue: 17 minutes (7.3 mi)
Broke Leg Falls: 7 minutes (3.7 mi)
Natural Bridge: 45 minutes (25 mi)
Cave Run Lake/Scott’s Creek Marina: 31 minutes (21 mi)
Morehead: 36 minutes (25 mi)
Dollar General (nearest store): 9 minutes (4.5 mi)

The best way to get around is by car. There is private parking on the property. We also have a separate parking pad available for a boat if needed.

There is little cell phone service at the cabin but you can use Wi-Fi calling.

sectionedDescription/description:
Nestled in the beautiful Appalachian Mountains, a great place for outdoor enthusiasts and adventure seekers. Whether you enjoy riding the Hatfield-McCoy Trails or engage in hiking, fishing or kayaking you will love the convenience of our location to all your adventures. This unit offers a full kitchen with basic necessities, a spacious living room, 1 bedroom, 1 full bathroom with basic amenities, charcoal grill, picnic table, firepit, and plenty of parking for ATVs and trailers.

Unit A is fully furnished and stocked with the basic necessities. The bedroom comes with clean linen, pillows and blankets. The bathroom has towels, toilet paper, soap, shampoo and conditioner. The kitchen is furnished with a microwave, 1 cup-Keurig, toaster, complete assortment of dishware, cooking utensils and appliances. Fully heated and air conditioned inside with a nest thermostat
Plenty of parking for ATVs & Trailers.

Shared front and back deck access, charcoal grill, picnic table and firepit.

primaryHost/about: I have been an Airbnb host for about 3 years and due to good reviews, have earned the super host status.  I am within a mile of the property and available if needed.  You will find the  pictures to be true to the property and very clean.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Cozy, Country setting.  Very neat and clean 2 bedroom apartment with two queen beds.  Country feel but close to all the necessities.  You have the property to yourself and there's lots of parking.  You are just minutes from Walmart, Dollar General, fast food and local restaurants.  This property is just 15 minutes from Rush Off Road with easy parking for trucks and trailers.

This is a 2 bedroom apartment in a very private location but close to everything you need.

We live very close to the property and are available via text or phone call.

The property is located in a very safe area.  If you come from the city this may be a little quiet for you.  You might even have a deer or two visit you.

There is private parking.

The property is less than 10 minutes from I-64 and downtown Ashland.

sectionedDescription/description:
Quaint getaway in a peaceful setting offers a distant hillside view with an occasional train coming around the hill. This second story apartment has..
. Three bedrooms
. Two bathrooms
.  Kitchen
.  Dining area
.  Living room
.  Wifi
.  Wash room with washer and dryer
.  Free parking

Great location for traveling healthcare professionals or anyone interested in work in the nearby towns. 
No smoking or pets allowed.

I have a no pet policy and this includes service animals because I have allergies. I take daily prescribed medicines plus monthly allergy shots. I love animals but I am the one who cleans the apartment.

This is a stand alone apartment. Inside spaces are not shared with anyone. The parking is shared with the first story guest.

Great location for traveling healthcare professionals or anyone interested in work in the nearby towns. This apartment is within 
 
5 minutes of Martin ARH Our Lady of the way Hospital
 
15 minutes of Prestonsburg Highlands ARH Regional Medical Center
 
20-25 minutes to Paintsville Paul B. Hall regional Medical Center
 
20-25 minutes to Pikeville       Medical Center

20 minutes to McDowell ARH Hospital

A blacktop parking area is available in front of the apartment. This area is shared with the 1st floor guest.

If your stay is during the summer you may hear the lawn mower or weed eater. 

This is a very safe place to stay. My last two bookings were traveling healthcare professionals who worked at Pikeville Medical during their stay. I have had many long term stays. There is a built in discount for stays of 28 days or longer.

Hello, 
Meeks Rentals and Leasing is located in Hurricane WV. We provide long term and short term rentals up and down the east coast. Feel free to ask us any questions you may have and enjoy your stay with us!
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience Huntington city living without being in the inconvenience of downtown in this stylish 3 bedroom, 1 full bath home! Stocked with towels, linens, and cooking necessities, this home is perfect for a traveling professional! This home is 3.4 miles from Cabell Huntington Hospital and 4.8 miles from St. Mary's Hospital. Enjoy the lovely town and all it has to offer, from fine prepared foods, to the great night life.

name: Centrally located 2 bedroom, 1 bath home.  3 Beds.
sectionedDescription/access: Entire home
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome home!  Whether you are coming or going, you are minutes from everything Ashland has to offer!  A short 5 minute drive will have you downtown, the park, KDMC, or any of our local eateries.  Head 7 minutes in the opposite direction, and you’ll be at Ashlands newest attraction; Malibu Jacks!  

You’ll have all the comforts of home, including a fully stocked kitchen for the cook.  The main bedroom has a queen size mattress, the guest room has two twins!

Entire home

I will always be available to help! I will be available through instant message and/or text.

Important to note. The driveway is a little steep. If you have a truck or SUV it will be no problem. The driveway provides two parking spaces. However there is on street parking available in front of the home as well with a walkway that leads directly to the front door.

No smoking allowed inside the home.

For reservations that are longer  than 6 days  an additional 55 cleaning fee per week will be charged at the 7th day THIS IS NON NEGOTIABLE , IT IS IMPORTANT TO MAINTAIN  SANITARY STANDARDS 

Only maximum of 5 guest allow per reservation , extra charge will be apply for extra guest no sleeping capacity

sectionedDescription/description:
This Lovely two bedroom house is located a block away from St Mary's Hospital.  Perfect for traveling doctors, nurses or hospital consultants.   Minutes away from Marshall University (Joan C. Edwards Stadium and the Cam Henderson Center),  the Civic Center (Mountain Health Arena) & downtown Huntington.  15 minutes to the Huntington Mall and Barboursville Park/Soccer Complex.  20 Minutes to Cabell Huntington Hospital.

Entire house is private to guest.

Conveniently located to all Huntington Attractions and Businesses .   Seven miles from the Robert Newlon Airport, WV's only public grass airstrip, home of the WV Skydivers and the Fly in Cafe, for great fresh seafood.

name: Hillbilly Hideout-The Cove
sectionedDescription/description:
Whether you're looking to ride the Hatfield-McCoy Trails or plan a weekend getaway, this cabin is perfect for you!
Hillbilly Hideout 2 ( The Cove ) is located in historical downtown Williamson, just 0.3 miles from the Trail #10 entrance.  

There are several restaurants and convenience stores within walking distance. 

Come Hideout with us!
www.hillbillyhideout.com

Newly renovated!! Cozy one bedroom cabin perfect for a couple or single family.  Located directly behind Hillbilly Hideout Cabin. 

Full kitchen with all new appliances. Full bath with shower/tub combo. 

Sit back, relax, and enjoy!

Our main goal is to provide our guests with a memorable experience and exceptional hospitality! 

Our self check-in procedure allows guests to check-in and out without having to interact with the host. However, we live only 15 minutes from our rentals and are always available to accommodate our guests with whatever they need.

name: (u2) Lovely high end 1 bedroom with pull out sofa.
sectionedDescription/access:
Enjoy the privacy of a 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment that is dedicated solely for guest use. The sofa also makes a bed. 
Keyless entry to your apartment. 
Free Street parking and also a free parking garage only a block away.
There are stairs to climb to reach your apartment.
sectionedDescription/description:
Surround yourself with understated elegance

Enjoy a great nights sleep on a premium mattress with whisper quiet remote ac. If you feel the need or just want to cook, all appliances are top of the line. And don’t run out to do laundry. Do it as you relax and watch one of the two smart tv’s.
THIS UNIT DOES NOT HAVE A WINDOW WITH A VIEW. THE WINDOW IS FOR EGRESS ONLY. IT DOES NOT GO TO THE OUTSIDE!

Enjoy the privacy of a 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment that is dedicated solely for guest use. The sofa also makes a bed. 
Keyless entry to your apartment. 
Free Street parking and also a free parking garage only a block away.
There are stairs to climb to reach your apartment.

We will be available any time that we are needed and would love to meet each guest personally

We are located right in the middle of everything downtown! 
UPike, med school, optometry school, Appalachian Wireless Arena, historical museum, shopping, and restaurants. Pikeville Medical Center is within walking distance.

Walking will be suitable unless you want to venture out.

CLEANING FEE: 
$20 for up to 6 nights
$50 for 6+ nights 
$100 for 28+ nights 
This has not been added as a nightly fee because all would be a set amount. 
There will be a request thru the resolution center on the 1st day of your stay, based on the length of your stay. 
PET FEE: 
$20 per night for up to 2 “Non- Aggressive” pets less than 20 pounds. 
Not to exceed $200
This fee has not been added as a nightly fee because all would be a set amount. 
There will be a request sent thru the resolution center on the 1st day of your stay, based on the length of your stay. 
If you do not disclose that there are pets, you may be asked to leave or you  will have the option to accept the request for the fee thru the resolution center. 
The number of people that will be in the unit must be disclosed also. There will be linens based on the number of people and the number of nights.

sectionedDescription/access: Laundry facility
sectionedDescription/description:
This modern apartment (located above a popular consignment shop) in the east end of downtown Ashland offers a quiet respite to a working professional or a couple visiting from out of town.

This space has a modern look.

Laundry facility

I love people and am available most anytime to answer questions, take care of requests and resolve any issues to ensure a perfect stay.

This apartment is located above a local well known consignment shop.  Housed in a historical two story brick building built in the 1920's. Make sure you check out Suplex Tacos one block down or our local restaurants like The Winchester, Fat Patty's, La Finca’s, Blazer’s, Smoking J’s BBQ or Texas Roadhouse for a great steak.

Ample complimentary off street parking is available on all sides of the building. If you are flying in from Huntington or Charleston Airport, you can use I-64 W to US-23 N then turn left on 23rd St. Bus stop is a block away but only offers a limited schedule.

This apartment is located on a second floor. There is no elevator access. Our Central Park is within 1 block as is one of our main hospitals, Kings Daughters Medical Center.
Effective 9/01/19, the City of Ashland passed an ordinance requiring hosts of all Airbnbs within the city to collect from guests a local 3% tourism tax on each reservation. This is in addition to KY state tourism tax collected. You will find this tax under the "Community Fee" at checkout. Pets are absolutely prohibited. Failure to follow this no pet rule will result in immediate departure.
Due to our insurance liability, no commercial use of the space is allowed. Only registered guests are allowed. Parties are prohibited. Failure to abide by these rules will result in immediate cancellation of reservation and immediate departure.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: All guests are expected to respect that others reside in the same apartment building. Therefore no parties at any time or guests permitted or any loud noises after 10pm. All trash must be put in the dumpster outside the building upon checkout. No pets or smoking permitted.

Make sure you check out Suplex Tacos one block down or our local restaurants like The Winchester, Fat Patty's, La Finca’s, Blazer’s, Smoking J’s BBQ or Texas Roadhouse for a great steak.
sectionedDescription/notes:
This apartment is located on a second floor. There is no elevator access. Our Central Park is within 1 block as is one of our main hospitals, Kings Daughters Medical Center.
Effective 9/01/19, the City of Ashland passed an ordinance requiring hosts of all Airbnbs within the city to collect from guests a local 3% tourism tax on each reservation. This is in addition to KY state tourism tax collected. You will find this tax under the "Community Fee" at checkout. Pets are absolutely prohibited. Failure to follow this no pet rule will result in immediate departure.
Due to our insurance liability, no commercial use of the space is allowed. Only registered guests are allowed. Parties are prohibited. Failure to abide by these rules will result in immediate cancellation of reservation and immediate departure.
sectionedDescription/space: This space has a modern look.
sectionedDescription/summary: This modern apartment (located above a popular consignment shop) in the east end of downtown Ashland offers a quiet respite to a working professional or a couple visiting from out of town.
sectionedDescription/transit: Ample complimentary off street parking is available on all sides of the building. If you are flying in from Huntington or Charleston Airport, you can use I-64 W to US-23 N then turn left on 23rd St. Bus stop is a block away but only offers a limited schedule.

sectionedDescription/access: This is a small little town with a big personality and plenty of parking.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. This two bedroom apartment is located in the downtown area of Paintsville Kentucky. As a guest you will be walking distance from the local hospital, restaurants, bars, antique district and much more.
As an interior decorator I change the decor and furniture on a regular basis. So, what you see in the pics may be different when you arrive at the property but I do try to take current photos and upload them in a timely manner.

The entire unit has been recently renovated within the month of May 2023 with new flooring, complete new kitchen, enlarged bathroom etc. and freshly painted.
The unit has an open concept kitchen, breakfast area, and living room. 
The two bedrooms are very spacious. 
A desk/work area is located in one of the bedrooms. 
The Bathroom as been recently renovated and enlarged. The bathroom sink has a gorgeous granite top. 
There are granite countertops and gorgeous tile backsplash in the kitchen. The refrigerator, Dishwasher, Stove, and microwave are all stainless steel new or recently purchased. New Pots and Pans were recently purchased for the kitchen.
The unit has beautiful but durable faux grey stone flooring for easy cleaning and no carpeting.
New wooden blinds were installed on all windows May 2023. 
There is an outdoor area near the front door with a square, patio table and four chairs.

This is a small little town with a big personality and plenty of parking.

I will be available to help you with anything of concern in regards to your stay. I also have a back up person who is available in case I have an emergency or have to be out of town.
Maintenance is done on Tuesdays and Wednesdays by Tuscany maintenance. 
All guests will be notified when maintenance has to enter the property or be on the property.

This is a very safe neighborhood in comparison to other places. 
The town has a lot of historical homes that are on the Kentucky historical home registry.
I really enjoy walking through the town and looking at the Architecture.

There are a plethora of things within walking distance of the rental unit. Restaurants, bars, antique shops, hair salons, Library etc. 
The local hospital is directly behind the rental unit.
MedExpress pharmacy is located across the bridge and to the left less than a quarter of a mile and located on the right. 
Med Express pharmacy is open Monday through Friday.

The unit is Covid clean upon guest arrival. 
Once a guest is in the Airbnb they are responsible for cleaning it. I like to give my guest full privacy and reduce the number of people who touch things due to Covid.
I do have an excellent housekeeper if you would like to obtain her services.

name: Ritter Park Residency
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
If you are coming to Huntington, WV and are needing a one bedroom apartment, we have the place for you.  Centrally located:  2 blocks from Ritter Park and less than a mile from downtown Huntington, Cabell Huntington Hospital, and Marshall University, this spacious second floor apartment with private entrance has all the modern conveniences including a full kitchen, private bath and security system.  This apartment sleeps 1-2 guests and comes with internet and netflix.

Enjoy the tranquility of Ritter Park and the Rose Garden there.  Hike one of the trails or play tennis on one of the lighted public
tennis courts.  And visit the YMCA that is only a block away.  Downtown Huntington has many popular restaurants and retail stores and also a movie theater for your entertainment.

We live in Huntington so we are usually available to take care of any situation that may arise.

name: Riverfront Trail House.
primaryHost/about: My husband and I have lived in the coalfields of southern WV our entire lives.  We enjoy traveling, but love where we live and all it has to offer.  We  spend our free time on our rivers and streams kayaking and fishing, mountain biking and hiking on our trails at Chief Logan State Park and riding the trails of the Hatfield McCoy system on our motorcycles or ATV.  Logan is an outdoorsmans dream! We look forward to sharing our bit of our WV with you.
sectionedDescription/description:
Centrally located near the Bearwallow and Rockhouse trail systems in Logan WV.  Our renovated 2 bedroom, 2 bath house sleeps up to 10 people.   Enjoy the convenience of unloading your machines and not having to trailer them for trail access. Our property provides spacious parking for multiple vehicles, haulers and ATV's.   Enjoy our WV mountains from the trails or from our beautiful deck overlooking the Guyandotte river.   If you are looking for convenience at a great price, look no further.

The house has  3 common areas (living room, den and sunroom).   There are plenty of sleeping options including two bedrooms (bedroom 1 - queen and bedroom 2 - 2 full beds), a full size futon with a twin bunk in the den and a full size sleeper sofa in the living room. 

Our property includes a great outdoor space.  Cook dinner on our full size propane grill and dine on our beautiful deck overlooking the Guyandotte river. River access for fishing and kayaking is nearby. 

Enjoy the conveniences of home with our high speed internet/wifi, two smart tv's (58" living room and 55" den), washer and dryer, dishwasher and keyless entry.  

Spacious driveway parking and extra lot for additional vehicles, haulers and ATV's.  
 
Conveniently located in the heart of the Hatfield McCoy trail system.  Less than 2 miles from two separate trail heads of the Bearwallow trails.  

Walk or ride your ATV to local restaurants and shopping.  We are located next to Morrison's Drive Inn.  Morrison's Drive Inn restaurant has been serving food since 1947.  

Logan is an ATV friendly town.  Ride your machine on our county roads, exploring all our town has to offer.

We live close to our Airbnb rental cottage and will be available by cell (text or call) to assist our guests with any question/need that may arise during their stay.  We want to assist our guests with having the best getaway as possible.

Our 2 bedroom (sleeps 10) home is conveniently located near trailheads, restaurants and gas stations.  The Bearwallow trail system is accessible at two locations, both within two miles of our home.  Morrison’s drive Inn is only steps away, offering the best hotdogs, onion rings and shakes since 1947.  There are two Mexican restaurants and a Pizza Hut within a mile of the house.  Two gas stations are also nearby.

Our trail house has direct access to the Hatfield McCoy trail system.  No need to haul your trailer to local trailheads.  We are conveniently located on the Bearwallow trail system.  We have additional parking across the alley, directly in front of our home.

additionalHouseRules:
While we love to welcome families with children, please be aware that our home backs up to a river. It takes a lot of effort to go down to the river, but if you’re bringing children please be aware of the dangers that could present themselves. Any danger that could arise from use of fire pits is a risk parents take when building a fire for their family to enjoy. Parents are responsible for the safety of their own children while on our property. 

- Quiet hours between 10:00pm and 6:00am

Check out time is no later than 10:00am. If you'd like a later check out you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for later check out. 

Check in time is 4:00pm or later. If you'd like earlier check-in you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for early check-in.

name: Spacious Queen Suite with Large Bathroom
p3SummaryAddress: Saint Albans, West Virginia, United States
photos/4/caption:
TV with built in DVD player
DVDs and some cards games provided in the top dresser drawer for your enjoyment!
photos/5/caption: We can provide a mattress on the floor for one extra guest making this space suitable for 3 guests.
photos/6/caption:
Large closet with hangers if you should need it. 
Closet also houses iron, ironing board, card table and folding chairs for extra seating, game playing, or whatever you may need it for.
photos/8/caption: Large bathroom with standing shower and whirlpool tub
photos/9/caption: Luxurious bath tub perfect for relaxing!
photos/10/caption: Small coffee pot provided (as well as coffee, creamer, sugar). Mini fridge has been added for convenience.
photos/13/caption: Private entrance and deck for your enjoyment
photos/14/caption: Beautiful view of the back yard overlooking the Coal River
photos/15/caption: Perfect space for enjoying coffee, breakfast, or doing some work on your laptop.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Guests have access to the entire Queen suite which includes large bathroom, closet, and private deck. Guests may also use the back yard area or fire pit (at their own risk).
sectionedDescription/description:
Quiet and spacious Queen suite and large spa-like private bathroom (with jacuzzi tub)! Just a 20 minute drive from West Virginia's capitol city--Charleston! Minutes from dining and shopping options in small town Saint Albans. Located in a quiet neighborhood that is great for walking, jogging or biking.

Suite is attached to the main house but sectioned off for your privacy (door to main house is locked from both sides during your stay). Luxurious spa-like bathroom complete with standing shower and separate jacuzzi tub. Mini-fridge, microwave, and coffee pot in room for you convenience. TV (no cable), WIFI, DVDs, board/card games, dining suggestions, books and magazine all provided in room. Guest has complete control of heating/AC in room. Private entrance with lovely deck and view of the Coal River. Park in our driveway and enter around back through wooden gate and continue along gravel path to suite's entrance.

Guests have access to the entire Queen suite which includes large bathroom, closet, and private deck. Guests may also use the back yard area or fire pit (at their own risk).

We love to meet each of our guests but also realize that’s not always feasible. Our interaction can be as much or as little as our guests would like. We are a busy family so we are often not around in evenings. We offer self check in for all guests but are happy to show you to the room personally if you’d like! If you prefer your privacy, that’s fine by us! We love to recommend restaurants and other activities for guests to try in our small town...so please ask!

Riverlike Estates is a fairly large, quiet neighborhood located a few miles outside of Saint Albans, WV. It is perfect for walking, jogging, or cycling. Neighbors are very friendly! In the middle of the neighborhood is a lake where you may fish, as well as basketball court and play grounds. Secluded neighborhood gives a serene feel to the space.
Though it is a few miles from town it is still convenient to essential amenities. A Dollar General store and Par Mar Convenience store/gas station are both located within walking distance and other essentials (coffee shop, restaurants, post office, library, banks, laundry mat, grocery stores, etc) are only a couple minute (3-5 minute) drive back to town.

This space is located several miles from the nearest bus station and buses do not run to our neighborhood. Uber and Lyft (as well as local taxi service) are available if you do not have transportation of your own. Parking for your vehicle is provided in our driveway.

Please be aware that we do have children and pets. They will not be in your space, but you will definitely see "signs of life". Our Labradoodle Barnabas and his sidekick Goldendoodle Finn might greet you with a bark, and you'll see our children (or their toys) playing in the yard frequently. 

Check out time is no later than 10:00am. If you'd like a later check out you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for later check out. Late check out will be granted based on availability. 

Check in time is 4:00pm or later. If you'd like earlier check-in you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for early check-in. Early check in will only be granted based on availability. 

As listed in the amenities section, we have a TV in the space but no cable. Some guests choose to bring their own streaming device (FireStick, AppleTV, etc) or just use the DVD player we have available. 

Coffee is provided in room for your convenience as well as a few snacks and cold breakfast items (breakfast bars or oatmeal)

There is a mini fridge, electric kettle and microwave in the room for your use. 
 
We do have children in our home and while we attempt to keep the noise levels to a minimum, please know that it is likely that you will hear us throughout your stay.

This is a non-smoking space. Smoking is not permitted inside the suite.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
While we love to welcome families with children, please be aware that our home backs up to a river. It takes a lot of effort to go down to the river, but if you’re bringing children please be aware of the dangers that could present themselves. Any danger that could arise from use of fire pits is a risk parents take when building a fire for their family to enjoy. Parents are responsible for the safety of their own children while on our property. 

- Quiet hours between 10:00pm and 6:00am

Check out time is no later than 10:00am. If you'd like a later check out you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for later check out. 

Check in time is 4:00pm or later. If you'd like earlier check-in you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for early check-in.
sectionedDescription/interaction: We love to meet each of our guests but also realize that’s not always feasible. Our interaction can be as much or as little as our guests would like. We are a busy family so we are often not around in evenings. We offer self check in for all guests but are happy to show you to the room personally if you’d like! If you prefer your privacy, that’s fine by us! We love to recommend restaurants and other activities for guests to try in our small town...so please ask!
sectionedDescription/name: Spacious Queen Suite with Large Bathroom
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie:
Riverlike Estates is a fairly large, quiet neighborhood located a few miles outside of Saint Albans, WV. It is perfect for walking, jogging, or cycling. Neighbors are very friendly! In the middle of the neighborhood is a lake where you may fish, as well as basketball court and play grounds. Secluded neighborhood gives a serene feel to the space.
Though it is a few miles from town it is still convenient to essential amenities. A Dollar General store and Par Mar Convenience store/gas station are both located within walking distance and other essentials (coffee shop, restaurants, post office, library, banks, laundry mat, grocery stores, etc) are only a couple minute (3-5 minute) drive back to town.
sectionedDescription/notes:
Please be aware that we do have children and pets. They will not be in your space, but you will definitely see "signs of life". Our Labradoodle Barnabas and his sidekick Goldendoodle Finn might greet you with a bark, and you'll see our children (or their toys) playing in the yard frequently. 

Check out time is no later than 10:00am. If you'd like a later check out you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for later check out. Late check out will be granted based on availability. 

Check in time is 4:00pm or later. If you'd like earlier check-in you must let us know 48 hours prior to your arrival. A $10 fee will be assessed for early check-in. Early check in will only be granted based on availability. 

As listed in the amenities section, we have a TV in the space but no cable. Some guests choose to bring their own streaming device (FireStick, AppleTV, etc) or just use the DVD player we have available. 

Coffee is provided in room for your convenience as well as a few snacks and cold breakfast items (breakfast bars or oatmeal)

There is a mini fridge, electric kettle and microwave in the room for your use. 
 
We do have children in our home and while we attempt to keep the noise levels to a minimum, please know that it is likely that you will hear us throughout your stay.

This is a non-smoking space. Smoking is not permitted inside the suite.
sectionedDescription/space: Suite is attached to the main house but sectioned off for your privacy (door to main house is locked from both sides during your stay). Luxurious spa-like bathroom complete with standing shower and separate jacuzzi tub. Mini-fridge, microwave, and coffee pot in room for you convenience. TV (no cable), WIFI, DVDs, board/card games, dining suggestions, books and magazine all provided in room. Guest has complete control of heating/AC in room. Private entrance with lovely deck and view of the Coal River. Park in our driveway and enter around back through wooden gate and continue along gravel path to suite's entrance.
sectionedDescription/summary: Quiet and spacious Queen suite and large spa-like private bathroom (with jacuzzi tub)! Just a 20 minute drive from West Virginia's capitol city--Charleston! Minutes from dining and shopping options in small town Saint Albans. Located in a quiet neighborhood that is great for walking, jogging or biking.
sectionedDescription/transit: This space is located several miles from the nearest bus station and buses do not run to our neighborhood. Uber and Lyft (as well as local taxi service) are available if you do not have transportation of your own. Parking for your vehicle is provided in our driveway.

additionalHouseRules:
- No smoking, vaping, incense, or sage/smudge sticks of any kind
- No open flames
- No parties
- Additional cleaning fees will be assessed to clean any odors, stains, or soiled items
- Please do not rearrange the furniture
- Please be respectful of antique furniture. It's had a long life and I want to make sure it has a lot of life left
- Please keep noise to a minimum between 11:00 pm and 6:00 am
- If guests are suspected of carrying, using, or dealing illegal drugs of any kind, the authorities will be contacted, and guests will be asked to vacate the property immediately and will not be entitled to a refund of any kind

- Please drip the kitchen faucet if the low temperature will be below 20°F. If you need help please let me know. 
- Please keep the inside temperature between 50°F and 80F°
- Please turn off all lights when you leave

Please let me know immediately if something is malfunctioning so it can be addressed. However, the guest is responsible for all damage and missing items.

If any items are accidentally left behind, please make arrangements with me to pick them up or to arrange for shipment.  Do NOT come back into the apartment and pick them up without prior arrangments being made after the rental period.

Guests found to be in violation of any of these rules may be asked to leave immediately and required to cancel the remainder of their stay.

name: A private loft above an art gallery.
sectionedDescription/access: Guests have the entire apartment to themselves, plus access to the shared hallway, stairwell, and parking lot.
sectionedDescription/description:
Old US Post Office converted into an art gallery with apartments above.  The apartment has lots of charm and modern updates. It features lots of natural light, quiet neighborhood, and it's close to downtown and local parks.  There are several small businesses within walking distance. I offer a private parking lot with 24-hour surveillance. An adorable dog lives next door and offers free petting and tail wags.

Guests have the entire apartment to themselves, plus access to the shared hallway, stairwell, and parking lot.

I will provide the door code and other logistics prior to arrival.  

You won't be sharing any part of the apartment, so feel free to come and go as you please.

I live in the back apartment, which is just across the hallway, so if you need anything please let me know.

The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood, and it's close to downtown and local parks.  There are several small businesses within walking distance.

There is a bus stop located out in front of the apartment. A short walk down the road will take you to downtown Huntington.

***Cleaning Routine***
I meticulously clean all parts of the apartment. All linens are washed in hot water with Tide sensitive skin pods and fragrance free bleach.  I wipe down all surfaces with clorox spray and then wipe the surfaces a second time to make them shiny with 409 multi spray. I vaccum the floors and use Bona cleaner since the floors are antique. I also wipe down the hallway leading to the apartment. I don't use the shared hallway while I have guests to minimize any possible risks of exposure. I use our back door to come and go.

The rented space is listed as Apartment 2.  Please enter through the front door, marked with a metallic Airbnb logo. At the top of the stairs, the door will be on your right; also marked with a metallic Airbnb logo.

Please let me know if you have any allergies or other special considerations that may impact your stay and I will do my best to accommodate you.

sectionedDescription/access: The whole apartment is available for your use and enjoyment.
sectionedDescription/description:
Recently renovated with modern styling. Located within walking distance to Kings Daughter's Medical Center, Central Park and just a few blocks from downtown Ashland.

This modern apartment (located above a popular consignment shop) in downtown Ashland offers a quiet respite to a working professional or a couple visiting from out of town.

The whole apartment is available for your use and enjoyment.

We love hosting and are available by phone, text or social media!

This apartment is located above a local well known consignment shop.  Housed in a historical two story brick building built in the 1920's. Make sure you stop by our local favorites, The Winchester, Texas Roadhouse, Whitts or The Mill for good food.

Parking is easy with plenty of off street parking. Easy walk to Central Park or King’s Daughter’s Hospital.

Effective 9/01/19, the City of Ashland passed an ordinance requiring hosts of all Airbnbs within the city to collect from guests a local 3% tourism tax on each reservation. This is in addition to KY state tourism tax collected. You will find this tax under the "Community Fee" at checkout. Pets are absolutely prohibited. Failure to follow this no pet rule will result in immediate departure.
Our insurance liability prohibits commercial use of the property. Failure to abide by these rules will result in immediate cancellation of the reservation and departure. Parties are prohibited. Only registered guests are allowed access into the building. Failure to follow this policy will result in immediate termination of the reservation and departure.

additionalHouseRules: My house rules are a work in progress, and I welcome your input, but just so we're clear, I provide a private bedroom, but not a private bathroom. Toilet paper is on me, but shampoo, conditioners and the like are on you. You're welcome to use my water pic, but toothpaste is on you. Leave the toilet seats down, please. I wash all bed linens and towels and tidy up the bedroom between guests, or weekly for longer stayers, and I generally recycle everything except glass. No food scraps go into the trash; they rather get fed to the kitchen sink "Insinkerator." Turn off the lights when you leave a room. Thanks!

primaryHost/about: I’ve worn glasses since First Grade, not the same pair, of course, and nowhere near as exotic as Elton John’s collection of eyewear.

sectionedDescription/access: As my guest you're welcome to use all of the house's amenities, and to even take a plunge in the community pool, in season, of course.
sectionedDescription/description:
32 Geronimo Drive, Saint Albans, WV, my home since 1991, is in safe and quiet Indian Head, a neighborhood of town houses and single family dwellings that borders the Coal River. From my covered back porch, you might spot the occasional kayaker or paddling of ducks (a group of ducks can also be called a flock, brace, raft, and team).

The house has been improved significantly from top to bottom, and side to side. I'll give you the tour and the historical narrative if you'd like.

As my guest you're welcome to use all of the house's amenities, and to even take a plunge in the community pool, in season, of course.

Let me know of any special needs and I'll try to accommodate you.

There are any number of eateries in nearby Saint Albans. Just search "The Ten Best Saint Albans WV Restaurants".

Off street parking, but the nearest bus stop is 3 miles away.

Halloween is the busiest time of year. Kids and their parents come from miles around. The candy pounds per mile ratio is off the charts! Also, the Indian Head Yard Sale is always the first Saturday in May and the last Saturday in September.

No food scraps go into the trash; they rather get fed to the kitchen sink "Insinkerator." Turn off the lights when you leave a room. Thanks!

name: The Hideaway on Tacketts - Shipping Container
photos/0/caption: Living Area
primaryHost/about:
Hello, 
Meeks Rentals and Leasing is located in Hurricane WV. We provide long term and short term rentals up and down the east coast. Feel free to ask us any questions you may have and enjoy your stay with us!
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: There are two parking spots available.  Four wheel drive vehicles are not a must, but preferred for easy access to The Hideaway. However, transportation is provided with guests who may be hesitant to drive their vehicle to the top of the hill, where The Hideaway resides.
sectionedDescription/description:
The Hideaway is the perfect getaway for a cozy, private weekend for two! It is nestled in the mountains of Hurricane, WV. It has a serene view of the mountains and a fully stocked pond, ready for fishing. You will have the entire home to yourself, complete with a kitchen, living room, bathroom, and bedroom. On the deck there is a hot tub and a fire pit directly below. You will also have access to Meeks Mountain Trails, so bring your bikes and walking shoes!

Steps inside the front door, a kitchen providing an oven, stove, and fridge will greet you with basic cooking and baking needs. There is also a drip coffee pot available for your morning coffee. Moving to the living room, you will find a sofa and accent chair in front of a large windowed garage door boasting beautiful views of the scenery outside. There is also a 43 inch TV for your viewing pleasure. Moving to the full bathroom, you will find a standing shower where shampoo, conditioner, and body wash will be provided. The bathroom leads to the bedroom, which holds a full size bed and another 43 inch TV. Outdoor seating is available on the deck for four people along with a luxury spa for two to four people. Below the deck, you will find a fire pit with seating for four people as well.

There are two parking spots available.  Four wheel drive vehicles are not a must, but preferred for easy access to The Hideaway. However, transportation is provided with guests who may be hesitant to drive their vehicle to the top of the hill, where The Hideaway resides.

My wife and I live on the property where The HideAway is, so we are always available for anything you may need.

You will be completely secluded with only the mountains and pond in view.  Minutes away, the town of Hurricane awaits with its many restaurants and community activities. If you are visiting us during the summer, paddle boarding is available on the city reservoir through the Appalachian Boarding Company. Hurricane Valley Park is approximately one mile away where you can enjoy a wave pool, baseball field, soccer field, frisbee golf, and dog park. Some of our favorite local restaurants include Whiskey Taco, Baked Craft Wings, Fireside Grille, Belknap Dough Company, and Bridge Cafe and Bistro. Our go-to coffee shop is Drip on Main Street in Hurricane. While you’re there, make sure to swing by Peyton & Peppy Boutique for a new addition to your wardrobe. Lastly, if you’re looking for something sweet, Sweet Mama’s Bakery is the place to go. We are also conveniently located approximately thirty minutes from both cities of Charleston and Huntington where many more restaurants, shopping, and activities await you.

Private parking is available at The Hideaway.

A jon boat will be available to cruise around the fully stocked pond, so make sure to bring your fishing poles! Due to limited cell service, free wifi is provided.

There is also a drip coffee pot available for your morning coffee. Moving to the living room, you will find a sofa and accent chair in front of a large windowed garage door boasting beautiful views of the scenery outside. There is also a 43 inch TV for your viewing pleasure. Moving to the full bathroom, you will find a standing shower where shampoo, conditioner, and body wash will be provided. The bathroom leads to the bedroom, which holds a full size bed and another 43 inch TV. Outdoor seating is available on the deck for four people along with a luxury spa for two to four people. Below the deck, you will find a fire pit with seating for four people as well.
sectionedDescription/summary: The Hideaway is the perfect getaway for a cozy, private weekend for two! It is nestled in the mountains of Hurricane, WV. It has a serene view of the mountains and a fully stocked pond, ready for fishing. You will have the entire home to yourself, complete with a kitchen, living room, bathroom, and bedroom. On the deck there is a hot tub and a fire pit directly below. You will also have access to Meeks Mountain Trails, so bring your bikes and walking shoes!
sectionedDescription/transit: Private parking is available at The Hideaway.

No muddy clothes in washer

sectionedDescription/access: Outdoor dining area, side yard, fire pit
sectionedDescription/description:
Cottage 304 is a cozy, new construction, 2 bedroom house where you’ll feel right at home during your stay.  No need to trailer your ATVs!  We’re located just 1 mile from the Bearwallow trail of the Hatfield McCoy trails.  Enjoy evenings grilling your favorite meal on our park-style grill or relaxing by the fire pit. We're minutes from dining, shopping, and entertainment.  We offer plenty of private, secure parking,  quality mattresses, and new furnishings that will make your stay truly the best!

Casual, cottage style
Comfy mattresses and pillows
Central Heat and Air
Ceiling fans
Gated parking
Outdoor dining area
ATV friendly neighborhood
High speed internet
Cable tv in living room and both bedrooms
Fully equipped kitchen
Stocked coffee station

Outdoor dining area, side yard, fire pit

I am local and live only minutes away and will be available by phone if needed during your stay!

1.2 miles from Bearwallow trail
1.7 miles from Chief Logan State park which offers hiking, mountain bike trails, public swimming pool, playgrounds, fitness trail, fishing pond, outdoor amphitheater, and picnic shelter.

Cottage 304 is new construction and the address isn't recognized by GPS.  Please use the following address in your GPS to get to the cottage.  110 Second Ave, West Logan.

ATV friendly. You can ride your ATV on all public two lane roads with the purchase of a Hatfield McCoy trail pass.

name: Entire Guesthouse 2 miles or 3 mins from I-64
photos/21/caption:
TRAIL MAP
The blue lines are trails that are open.
Orange and blue are temporarily closed
primaryHost/about:
Hey... I'm Brad.
Huntington has always been my home and I enjoy meeting folks from other places.
I enjoy backpacking, wildlife, fishing, riding mountain bikes, and mostly hiking long distances in the mountains. 
Airbnb is a new venture for me and I love making things nice for the guests and treating them like I like to be treated.  The reviews are a cool reward.☺☺☺
Come on out and enjoy your stay.
Brad
sectionedDescription/access: You will have access to the guesthouse and some hiking trails on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Hello,
Our guest house is very private, quiet, cozy, secure and exceptionally clean.   A great couples retreat with 2+miles of hiking trails and a vast space for outdoor activities and wildlife viewing. 
   The beds are comfortable and the heat and air conditioning are great.  We have all the amenities...all linens and beddings are furnished.  There is a washer, dryer, iron and hair dryer and detergent.
We are nestled on over 100 acres of land and are 1000 feet from the nearest highway.

A clean and cozy guesthouse with nice touches of hardwood and hard surfaces. 
  One bedroom has a queen bed and the other has a bunkbed and both include bedding and extra blankets.
  There is a living room with a 4k smart TV, LAN line,  wifi router, Fast internet (119 mbps), and Roku.
  A wooden deck provides a great place to sit outside and relax and entertain.
Very private, safe, and secure.  Absolutely no animals or pets  allowed.

You will have access to the guesthouse and some hiking trails on the property.

I enjoy talking to to the guest but understand the  importance of letting the guest have their space.  I can be contacted by text, phone, or in person.

Our place is only 6 minutes from Cabell Huntington  Hospital and 10 minutes to Marahall University.  We are located just 1.5 miles south of interstate 64 at exit 11 with the comforts of a rural country setting and the convenience of being close to town.  The space is cozy and private.  The property offers hiking trails and wildlife viewing for those wanting to get out in nature.

You'll be best traveling via car in the the Huntington area and a 4 wheel drive when the roads get snowy.

NO ANIMALS- NO SMOKING OR VAPING INSIDE-NO PARTIES-NO DRUGS.  
This is a new listing and it's a new venture for me and my family.    I concider it to be a exceptionally clean place with plenty of privacy and easy access to the interstate and downtown Huntington.

additionalHouseRules:
🚨Parking is limited.  No more than two cars will fit in the driveway. There is no on-street parking at the property.  If you need to have additional parking there may be other options that we can discuss. These options are NOT guaranteed.  There may be fines and negative reviews for not following parking policies.                               👉 🚨🚨 PETS: Dogs are allowed. They must be kept on a leash when taking them outside.  You must be outside with them at all times. There are other dogs in the neighborhood so please KEEP your friend inside when you are inside and off the furniture.  You will be responsible for any damage done by your pet to furniture or the home itself.  There is an additional $50 charge for dogs.  It’ll be $75 for 3.  No more than 3 dogs allowed at once.  These charges are in place due to the extra cleaning we must do to ensure our nexts guests have a clean environment and anyone with pet allergies will have a great stay too. 

SORRY, NO CATS. 

🚨 Outside noise level must be respectful of others in the area. At 10pm there should be no music outside or loud conversations.  🚨 All fires must be extinguished prior to leaving the fire unattended for the night .  🚨 NO SMOKING WHILE IN THE HOT TUB! The hot tub must have an adult in there when someone under the age of 16 is using it. 🚨Please turn off all outside lights, fans and cover the hot tub before going in for the night.

name: Relax @ Rivertime w/a River & Bridge view + HotTub
photos/4/caption: This is what brings guests in from all over the country and Canada.  The view from the hot tub is as unique as you and I.   Only home in America with this amazing memory making backyard.
photos/7/caption:
Master bedroom - queen 
Over 100 guests say this bed is super comfy resulting in a great nights rest.  We think the hot tub might be helping with that too of course.
photos/8/caption: The back living room where you can relax after a day of discovery in the area and hitting the hot tub.
photos/11/caption: A spacious front living room area with high ceilings.  The couch is comfy enough for a quick nap but it also folds out into a queen bed.
photos/12/caption: The queen fold out couch located in the front living room.
photos/16/caption: The Bar area in the back of the home.  Perfect for having a snack and still taking in the beautiful view.
photos/18/caption: We’ve used this same brand of heater on our deck next door during the last two winters.  We were able to enjoy our morning coffee/tea and water view all winter long.
photos/19/caption: Nightly view from the backyard showing the Ironton-Russell bridge that spans the Ohio river.  It’s beauty instills a sense of deep relaxation for most visitors.
photos/21/caption: This is a Lava Heat propane tower heater.  The fire is mesmerizing as it dances around. BE CAREFUL though, the heat it puts off might put you to sleep.
photos/22/caption: We call this one, Firebow.  It’s a stunning moment during sunset on the river where the clouds formed a perfect arch, at the perfect time.
photos/32/caption: COOL-AIR Misting Fan to make even the hottest summer days in the backyard an en enjoyable experience.  Turn this on. Stretch out in a lounge chair.  Let the cool mist hit you while you get your tan on.  Set a timer, you might fall asleep!
photos/33/caption: COOL-AIR Misting Fan hangs on the end of the deck just waiting to help you read! When turned on you’ll be amazed at how quickly it makes it feel like the temp just dropped 10-15 degrees.  We love ours at home!!
photos/35/caption: The view from the hot tub.  You’ll never want to get out.
photos/50/caption: Precious memories with friends. Doesn’t get much better than that.    You too can create precious memories of your own.  Just hit that button to book your RIVERTIME experience.
primaryHost/about:
46 hoping for another 60!

Married to an incredibly beautiful and loving woman, Lisa.  Blessed with an amazing family including wonderful kids, 4 grandchildren, nieces, nephews and a bunch more. Plus add in the greatest friends anyone could ask for and life is amazing.  

We love concerts,  camping and relaxing on the porch.  Our passion is traveling preferably through abnb but also in both 5 STAR resort style or in a tent under the stars.  All have their own perks.  

We look forward to being immersed amongst many of the cultures our beautiful planet has to offer as we age gracefully together.   

We strive to provide our guests with a “RIVERTIME” experience that brings back smiles and laughter as they reminisce about their visit as they too age gracefully. 

Godspeed to all.
sectionedDescription/description:
Rivertime is a waterfront experience on the bank of the Ohio river.  Located a few mins from Ashland KY, Ironton OH & 20 mins to Huntington WV. Once you make your way into the backyard you will quickly forget that you are in an Eastern KY residential area.  The stunning view of the Ohio river & the Russell/Ironton bridge provides a mind blowing visual display.  It’s often stated the view rivals the top landscapes & city skyline views from around the world. *A misting zone is added in the summer.

They say staying here at “Rivertime” is an experience.  As you walk out the back door, take a deep breath, look out at the view and then exhale letting the stress of life fade away.  This is when the whole experience thing starts to sink in.  So now it’s time to hit the covered 30’x10’ deck.  Throw up your feet in one of the comfortable patio chairs or take a nap on the sofa.   As the night comes on enjoy dinner and beverages with the beautiful bridge and water as your back drop.  Then start up the fire and create your tasty treats.   Before you head in for the night, it’s time to slip into the hot tub for a few minutes.   As the last little bit of stress that’s locked up starts to melt away take another deep breath, exhale and smile because you’re on Rivertime!

We have a heater on the deck that allows you to comfortably relax outside on the cool fall days.  On the coldest winter days add a blanket and kick back too. 

During summer visits we add a “Misting Fan” on the end of the deck.  This is so you can stretch out on one of our lounge chairs and get your tan on while the cool mist keeps you feeling cool.   It’s crazy how well the misting can works to keep the backyard feeling 10-15° cooler than it really is on the hottest summer days.

We are usually available within minutes of contact even though we own and run several businesses here in the area.  We live next door @ 111 just on the other side of a RETRACTABLE PRIVACY FENCE that allows for a more private Rivertime experience.   We have lived on the river for 8 years now and thought it was much to special of a place for us not to share it with the world.  We hope you visit soon.

Being located in downtown Russell you’ll get to experience the relaxing lifestyle of “small town America” that millions dream about being part of.   You’ll see kids riding bikes.  People walking their dogs.  People sitting on their front porches and waving to neighbors as they drive by.   We also have “Ferry St.” where you can shop, eat, drink and create MEMORIES  that’s only a few minutes walk along the riverbank.  We’re all even more excited about this area because of a RECENTLY OPENED BREWERY.  It’s owned by a family that has built this business after years of dreaming about it.  And Eridanus Brewing is already a local favorite. There’s The Nest Spa.  A luxurious full service spa that’s even got an amazing Salt Cave. Please start the booking process now because they stay full.  There’s a bakery with morning treats and a lunchtime menu.  Want to shop? There’s several unique boutiques with lots of locally made treasures. A really cool antique shop. There’s an event room at Bluegrass Mama Creations that is primarily used for paint parties you can schedule,  but you can also rent it out.  ALL OF THIS IS ONLY A 1/2 MILE AWAY.   We will send a highlighted list along other local favorites a day or so before you arrive.

Take a walk down Riverside Dr and see more of the amazing scenic views. Don’t be afraid to take your dogs too.  As long as they play well with others because there’s  always people out taking their best friends for a walk.

Parking is very limited.  There’s a driveway big enough for two small or 2 med vehicles.  We can fit two Ford flex’s in that spot.  It is only big enough for one large truck. Then the XL f250, 2500 or duelly type vehicles may have a hard time swinging in.   If this is your case we do have additional parking that we can discuss.   THERE IS NO ON-STREET PARKING FOR RIVERTIME GUESTS or ANYONE TRYING TO VISIT.  Visitors must use the driveway or you can let us know ahead of time because again, we do have some other arrangements we can discuss.  This is a small river-town where the properties are very close together. But you still feel a large sense of privacy.

primaryHost/about: I am a retired woman excited about being an AIRBNB host. I collect all things pineapple related. I also enjoy crafting and shopping. My loves live in Florida who call me “NaNa”. Welcome to my imperfectly perfect world! I live in the Pineapple Home so, I can’t wait to meet and greet everyone!!!
sectionedDescription/access: Shared areas are the den/TV. Kitchen which has the use of kcup coffee maker and toaster.And use of the electric stove and microwave.
sectionedDescription/description:
I live in a very nice subdivision, a very safe and family friendly area. My home is a one story house. You may park your car in front of the house in the blacktop to the left of the sidewalk.. facing the porch! 

While staying in my home, which I also live in, I will be available, but will respect your space and privacy.  I love talking with and meeting new people.

One queen size bed, a desk and closet space. Very nice private bathroom with shower in the bedroom. Apt size refrigerator in the bedroom for your use.

Shared areas are the den/TV. Kitchen which has the use of kcup coffee maker and toaster.And use of the electric stove and microwave.

I live here in my home so I will be available to greet you and answer any questions. But you will have your privacy.

The Map is WRONG the location of my house is coming up the hill and staying up to the right on Village Drive!   Riverwalk has a Kroger , T.J.MAXX, and several restaurants. Dunbar also has a Kroger and popular restaurants!   Corridor G where most shopping  and popular restaurants are located.                                                       8 miles or 20 minutes to drive to University of Charleston.                   1.6 miles or 6 minutes to drive to Thomas Hospital.                                  2.2 miles to Shawnee Sports Complex at Dunbar, Salango Way. Downtown Charleston is 15 minute drive

Park in front of the house in the blacktop that is to the left of the sidewalk facing the porch

Very easy access to Interstates 64&74& 77. Minutes to Thomas Memorial Hospital using Kanawha Turnpike.  Downtown South Charleston has many restaurants and a Antique Mall. My favorite restaurant in South Charleston is Olive Tree , Cafe  Appalachia, Happy Days & for the “sweets” Spring Hill Bakery their famous “hot dogs”. Elephant Thia is an excellent restaurant also. Downtown Charleston; Pies & Pints, Taylor Books and visit our Charleston Market!

primaryHost/about: I am a happy person.
sectionedDescription/access:
PRIVATE ROOM ONLY- for the weary traveler needing only a place for temporary rest-until you hit the road again. This Private bedroom has a bathroom inside.

Shared Living Room. Shared Kitchen. Shared dining space. Shared office/work area. Shared Washers & dryers in Laundry Rooms are available in 3 of the apartments. Laundry may have to be scheduled-if your space doesn’t have one & your stay is longer than 6 days.
sectionedDescription/description:
Renovations COMPLETED!!!
3 Blocks off the Ohio River.  Be on the border.  Love life.

Call your #1 Realtor Shirley G for this and any other homes you’d enjoy here in Huntington or tri-state area.  Have a wonderful stay and “make sure you do everything I wouldn’t do”.

This booking is only a PRIVATE bedroom.  with bathroom door inside this bedroom. PRIVATE desk.  SHARED living room. SHARED kitchen. SHARED pots and pans. SHARED cups & dishes.  SHARED dining area. SHARED bathroom in the daytime. SHARED TV in the living room.  Are you ok with this or do you need the “whole apartment”? Full apartment is only $25 more per night.

Inside the apartment is very peaceful, cozy, and modern.  Free wifi.

Exterior/Neighborhood:
On the border of Ohio River= State of Ohio and it’s next to Ashland, Kentucky.  4 Minutes to Marshall University. 4 minutes to Downtown Huntington. 3 blocks east of “Old” Downtown “Central City”.  Be 40 minutes away from the capital, Charleston. Mountains view- ALL DAY LONG.

PRIVATE ROOM ONLY- for the weary traveler needing only a place for temporary rest-until you hit the road again. This Private bedroom has a bathroom inside.

I would love to socialize-if you’d like. I enjoy getting to know people.  Am available to all guests by phone, texts, or steps away in the next building (if need be).

Everything.  Marshall University. Pullman Square Shopping Center. Cabell Huntington Hispital, St Mary’s Hospital, King’s Daughters Hospital, Marathon Huge Gas Plant, Just look at Google map.  Highways, Restaurants, grocery stores, Dollar stores, gas stations, old downtown, shopping...you name it...

Car, bike, or Uber

Jogging or running trail along the Ohio River- accessible only 3 blocks away. Enjoy staying fit while vacationing. Yoga mats available to borrow- upon request.

photos/1/caption: Master bath with rainfall shower and heated bathroom floors.
photos/2/caption: Wet bar with ice maker and wine chiller.
photos/3/caption: Modern dining table and tufted seating for six.
photos/5/caption: Night view from living room and guest bedroom balcony.
photos/14/caption: Balcony View
sectionedDescription/description:
Lay your head in the clouds. Sky Loft on 10 is a brand new, state-of-the-art loft furnished with modern luxuries. It is conveniently located in the center of the city blocks away from downtown, Paramount Arts Center, KDMC, Central Park and the Ashland Town Center Mall. Tenth floor views and access to two private balconies provide stunning views of the city, riverfront and Tri-State area. Perfect for hosting or a relaxing getaway. Your next stay, retreat or celebration is just on the horizon.

Master bed and bath with rainfall shower, heated bathroom floors, double vanities and 70" TV.
Second bedroom King with private bath and 55" TV.
Floor to ceiling windows throughout.
Open concept living room, kitchen and bar with balcony access.
Gas-heated fireplace with color changing options.
Common space houses 75" inch TV with surround sound and Bluetooth speaker capabilities.
New and industrial kitchen appliances with both  bar and formal dining seating.

Host lives nearby and is available if needed during your stay.

Sky Loft on 10 is a brand new space housed in the Sky Tower, a residential and commercial property overlooking the city. Central to downtown Ashland and historic Bath Avenue homes and Arts District.

Walk anywhere from Sky Loft on 10! Only blocks away from:
Central Park
Paramount Arts Center
Delta by Marriott Hotel
Highlands Museum & Discovery Center
KDMC
Kroger Plaza
Local Restaurants & Boutiques
Ashland Town Center Mall

Taxi services are available in the area.

name: Secluded Home with Pond-Front View on 40 Acres
photos/22/caption: Lower level gathering area
photos/24/caption: Enjoy your morning coffee on the upper level deck while being serenaded by the melodies of nature all around.
sectionedDescription/description:
Pure Country is a warm and inviting, "home away from home" with a rustic feel. This secluded property is nestled in a serene country setting on 40 acres, surrounded by hills, tall pines, and a pond-front view. Pure Country is a place to escape that gives all visitors the opportunity to flee from the fast-paced world. Just minutes from I-64, and the Huntington Tri-State Airport.

This spacious home offers a comfortable and relaxing stay for your vacation.

On the main level, you'll find three inviting bedrooms with cozy queen beds, ceiling fans, and flat screen TVs for your comfort and entertainment. Additionally, there are two full baths, ensuring convenience for all guests.

The upper deck, accessible from the kitchen area, provides the perfect spot to unwind and savor your morning coffee. Immerse yourself in the tranquil ambiance as you listen to the melodies of wildlife and the soothing sounds of nature.

Adjacent to the living area, you'll discover a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, complete with a microwave, dishwasher, and a convenient coffee and tea bar. We've also stocked the cookware you need to prepare delicious home-cooked meals. However, if cooking isn't part of your vacation plans, fret not! Numerous local restaurants are just a short drive away.

Relax and bond with your loved ones in the family room, where a cozy gas-burning fireplace awaits. Gather around and enjoy a movie together, with access to Wi-Fi and Dish Network for your entertainment needs.

The lower level of the house offers an additional spacious area with a well-equipped kitchen, perfect for prepping your meals before heading out to the gas grill just steps away.

Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature surrounding the property. Embark on a nature hike, find solace in a captivating book by the lake, or indulge in the tranquil activity of fishing. As dusk settles in, embrace the crackling fire and witness the enchanting sight of fireflies illuminating the night. Look up at the star-filled sky and let feelings of tranquility wash over you. Take a deep breath of the fresh country air and appreciate the wonders of our world.

We can't wait to host you and provide an unforgettable experience during your stay.

Large parking pad in front of the home, accommodating 8-10 vehicles. Overflow parking available.

Parties or events are not permitted. 
No pets allowed at this property.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: We have a “no pets” policy. This applies to guests of the house and also any visitors of guests. If pets are found to have been on the premises, an additional cleaning fee of $250 will be charged.

This spacious home offers a comfortable and relaxing stay for your vacation.

On the main level, you'll find three inviting bedrooms with cozy queen beds, ceiling fans, and flat screen TVs for your comfort and entertainment. Additionally, there are two full baths, ensuring convenience for all guests.

The upper deck, accessible from the kitchen area, provides the perfect spot to unwind and savor your morning coffee. Immerse yourself in the tranquil ambiance as you listen to the melodies of wildlife and the soothing sounds of nature.

Adjacent to the living area, you'll discover a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, complete with a microwave, dishwasher, and a convenient coffee and tea bar. We've also stocked the cookware you need to prepare delicious home-cooked meals. However, if cooking isn't part of your vacation plans, fret not! Numerous local restaurants are just a short drive away.

Relax and bond with your loved ones in the family room, where a cozy gas-burning fireplace awaits. Gather around and enjoy a movie together, with access to Wi-Fi and Dish Network for your entertainment needs.

The lower level of the house offers an additional spacious area with a well-equipped kitchen, perfect for prepping your meals before heading out to the gas grill just steps away.

Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature surrounding the property. Embark on a nature hike, find solace in a captivating book by the lake, or indulge in the tranquil activity of fishing. As dusk settles in, embrace the crackling fire and witness the enchanting sight of fireflies illuminating the night. Look up at the star-filled sky and let feelings of tranquility wash over you. Take a deep breath of the fresh country air and appreciate the wonders of our world.

We can't wait to host you and provide an unforgettable experience during your stay.
sectionedDescription/summary: Pure Country is a warm and inviting, "home away from home" with a rustic feel. This secluded property is nestled in a serene country setting on 40 acres, surrounded by hills, tall pines, and a pond-front view. Pure Country is a place to escape that gives all visitors the opportunity to flee from the fast-paced world. Just minutes from I-64, and the Huntington Tri-State Airport.

primaryHost/about:
I've lived in WV all my life and am married with 2 grown children. 
My favorite band is the Eagles.
sectionedDescription/access:
This is a 1-bedroom small house with a private, keyless entrance.  The passcode is sent after booking.
You will have a driveway to park in which is set at an incline, so be prepared as you are pulling in!
The road is sometimes busy as you pull in but we have not had any issues.
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome & thank you for checking out our place!  
We are within short driving distance to: Marshall University, Cabell Huntington Hospital or St. Mary's, the Huntington Mall The place is small, quaint and cozy, offers a full kitchen, comfy bed, we live close to a highway so there is some traffic and our driveway is at a incline we are in a protected area which is near the city and on a bus line.  
Also, our Wi-Fi is FAST!! 
Stay with us; voted the most desired AirBnB in Huntington in 2018!

This cute small house is perfect for overnight or a few days. It is a full 4 room apartment/small house above the garage. It used to be an rental space and now it's returned as an AirBnB. You have your own little apartment-style space - it is NOT shared with anyone.

Additionally, the yard is completely fenced in for your pet, we have 2 dogs here already!  The space is entirely yours, and protected as part of the backyard of our property but with it's own personal area.

This is a 1-bedroom small house with a private, keyless entrance.  The passcode is sent after booking.
You will have a driveway to park in which is set at an incline, so be prepared as you are pulling in!
The road is sometimes busy as you pull in but we have not had any issues.

I live in the main house and we are happy to help.

The houses are not on top of each other and there's a large backyard. There is a 2 lane road out front, and the river on the other side of the guard rail. Great view but no river access.

This location is heavily car-dependent with a bus coming by 3 times daily.

We have dogs, as does the neighbor. If you are uncomfortable around dogs this may not be the AirBnB for you.  Please be careful to close the gate as you are coming and going. 
Additionally, our neighbor raises chickens, ducks, quail and a host of other animals but they are just in the neighboring yard so they shouldn't be of any concern.

sectionedDescription/description:
Relax with the whole family at this Brand new Cabin.  A very peaceful place to stay. Sits on the Guyandotte River that's great for kayaking.   Very close to the Hatfield McCoy Bear Wallow trailhead.   Unload your ATV and hit the trail.  Restaurant on site and also very close to a car wash.  If you need a place to stay for the holidays while visiting family, this is the place for you!

We have 3 separate bedrooms.  In 2 of the bedrooms there are queen size bed.   In the other bedroom we have 2 full size beds.  We have 1 bathroom with a shower and a laundry area  a washer and dryer

I live just a few minutes from the cabin.  I’m easy to get in touch with should any problem occur

There's a Tudor's Biscuit World Restaurant on site.  Other restaurants nearby.  Also Chief Logan state park is just a couple of miles down the road.  There is a Carwash close by

Bearwallow is a fun trail. Small but worth a good ride. There is a hill climb on 35, a
Coal mine on 36, a Collapsed coal mine on 86.  83 is a fun,  but more technical trail that has a deep mud pit on it. 
27 has two decent mud holes right in the middle of a wide open area. 
28 is nothing but mud.

Nice fire pit with benches.  Please bring your own firewood.  Also have a corn  hole game on-site.

We do not permit any type of partying or loud music.


*We are also just a couple of of miles from chief Logan State Park.  In the month of December they have “Christmas in the Park” light display.  Best in the state! 

No smoking is permitted inside of cabin

primaryHost/about: Bill joined the AirB&B family in 2018 when his daughter thought he might enjoy listing one of his furnished apartments for short-term rental. The two of them had so much fun setting up the space for travelers that he has kept it going. Bill loves traveling and has been to various points around the USA, but nothing compares to his time spent in Uganda, East Africa (though he still claims West Virginia beats all!). He and his wife Cecilia have been married for over 50 years and have three grown children. His oldest daughter Angela rents her Farm House and Barn Loft on Airbnb, his youngest daughter Cara works as a nurse at CAMC, and his son Keith has been a missionary in Uganda. He has 18 grandchildren and0 he welcomes you to visit his Coal River Hideaways!

Guests have access to a full kitchen, clean towels, TV & wireless internet, and a washer and dryer. So whether you are a traveling nurse, have an extended stay with work, are visiting family in the area, or are simply site-seeing around the beautiful state of West Virginia, this is a very safe, relaxing, and affordable place to stay.

name: Outdoor Adventure Luxury Cabin Rental  "The Genoa"
primaryHost/about:
Rustic Ravines is the perfect getaway
Nestled in the foothills of the Allegheny Mountains, Rustic Ravines cabin rentals is West Virginia’s Ideal escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Our cabins sit on 300 acres of wooded paradise and are surrounded by 50,000 acres of private and public ATV trails, and other activities as diverse as kayaking, archery, fishing, hunting and golf. Our cabin rental facilities are ideal for events of all kinds. We’re located in Genoa, West Virginia, 27 miles south of Huntington and the Ohio River.

sectionedDescription/access: There is a fire pit behind your cabin that you have full access to as well. You will have free WIFI and an Amazon Fire Stick to be able to connect with the World if you wish to do so...and a Jacuzzi on the back deck if you decide not to LOL!
sectionedDescription/description:
Rustic Ravines is the perfect getaway!
Nestled in the foothills of the Allegheny Mountains, Rustic Ravines cabin rentals is West Virginia’s ideal escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Our cabins sit on 300 acres of wooded paradise and are surrounded by 50,000 acres of private and public ATV trails, and other activities as diverse as kayaking, archery, fishing, hunting and golf. (27 miles S. of Huntington WV)

You will have all the privacy you want atop the beautiful Rustic Ravines on our property.  You can hike anywhere you like around our property; on and off trail.

There is a fire pit behind your cabin that you have full access to as well. You will have free WIFI and an Amazon Fire Stick to be able to connect with the World if you wish to do so...and a Jacuzzi on the back deck if you decide not to LOL!

If you are going to use your GPS remember you are in West by God Virginia and the "Country Roads" are just that!  So, follow your path carefully and go to your destinations...Usually people decide they are "lost" when in fact they are going in the right direction...So if you use GPS trust the directions and don't second guess the computer lol!  Or, ask us for directions and follow them to the letter and you will do just fine ;)  Thanks, Joe Boffo

For an excellent Down Home Breakfast nearby try Dee's in Louisa, KY only about 11 miles away :)
