name: The "Mountaineer" Rustic Yurt
primaryHost/about:
Rustic Ravines is the perfect getaway
Nestled in the foothills of the Allegheny Mountains, Rustic Ravines cabin rentals is West Virginia’s Ideal escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Our cabins sit on 300 acres of wooded paradise and are surrounded by 50,000 acres of private and public ATV trails, and other activities as diverse as kayaking, archery, fishing, hunting and golf. Our cabin rental facilities are ideal for events of all kinds. We’re located in Genoa, West Virginia, 27 miles south of Huntington and the Ohio River.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Our guest will have access to all 300 acres of our property to hike and explore and enjoy!
sectionedDescription/description:
Our Mountaineer Yurt is an extremely unique structure. A wooden octagonal Yurt that was made from trees harvested from our property. Our pictures tell you a lot and give you an intriguing glimpse, but you will still be blown away when you see this Yurt in person. The 8 main support logs are great Ash Trees that were taken down because they were dying.  The roof is a 33' dia. metal Corn Bin Roof that makes a 20' high dome in the center

The space is an open floor plan and has many cool design features.  This Yurt has a queen bed and three pull-out queen sofas and a 65" TV with free WIFI and equipped with an Amazon Fire Stick for your viewing pleasure.  The Mountaineer Yurt also has an L-shaped bar that doubles as a dining area/gathering space. And, don't forget to check out the jacuzzi on the back deck ;) Oh and one more thing; the Mountaineer has a full bathroom/shower and get this...It's an "outhouse" built inside the house! How cool is that?

Our guest will have access to all 300 acres of our property to hike and explore and enjoy!

We do have ATV rentals and it's really fun to rent and ride a cool Side-by-Side around the area and explore our properties!

- 11 pm is quiet time
- Smoking is permitted on the deck or outside the cabin
- Please clean up after pets

primaryHost/about: I am a widowed father of 3 . I have 2 kids in college 1 in high school.1 have been self employed since 1997.I travel often for work and pleasure.
sectionedDescription/access:
THE PROPERTY HAS 13 ACRES MOSTLY HILLSIDE BUT THERE ARE FLAT WALKING AREAS
POND HAS FISH , JUST CATCH AND RELEASE
NO PETS INSIDE THE HOME
MY BROTHER HAS A RENTAL ACROSS THE STREET IF YOU NEED MORE ROOM FOR LARGER GROUPS  "THE COZY CABIN" MAY BE AVAILABLE.
sectionedDescription/description:
The Cabin is a fully furnished , 3 bedroom home on 13 acres, a pond 2 fire-pits, wildlife. The house has a gas  fireplace, and a fully stocked kitchen, also we provide a gas grill outside on the wrap around porch. The porch has a swing and plenty of seating. A  wash room with full size washer and dryer. The pond has a dock and is fully stocked. A king master suite with a  shower ,bath tub. A bunk room w/ 4 long bunks. Upstairs a balcony / queen bedroom overlooking the downstairs.

THE CABIN HAS 3- BEDROOMS A KING IN THE MASTER AND A QUEEN UPSTAIRS, THE THIRD ROOM IS A BUNK ROOM WITH 4  EXTRA LONG BUNKS (NO RAILS)
THE UPSTAIRS BEDROOM IS OPEN TO THE DOWNSTAIRS WITH A TV AND OUTSIDE BALCONY, LARGE CLOSET AND A LED LIGHTED HEADBOARD
THE MASTER BEDROOM HAS ITS OWN BATH AND SHOWER
THE HOUSE HAS A WRAP AROUND PORCH WITH THE FRONT COVERED AND  PLENTY OF SEATING
THERE IS A COVERED DOCK ON THE POND WITH A CHARCOAL PARK GRILL VERY NICE PLACE TO WATCH THE SUNSET
THERE ARE NO GATES ON THE DECKS OR THE STAIRS
THE CABIN HAS ALL THE  AMENITIES PROVIDED fully stocked kitchen
TOWELS,BEDDING, KUREG AND REGULAR COFFEE POT, OUTDOOR GRILL,  2-FIRE PITS

THE PROPERTY HAS 13 ACRES MOSTLY HILLSIDE BUT THERE ARE FLAT WALKING AREAS
POND HAS FISH , JUST CATCH AND RELEASE
NO PETS INSIDE THE HOME
MY BROTHER HAS A RENTAL ACROSS THE STREET IF YOU NEED MORE ROOM FOR LARGER GROUPS  "THE COZY CABIN" MAY BE AVAILABLE.

MOSTLY I WILL BE AVAILABLE BUT I TRAVEL A LOT.

THIS IS A COUNTRY SETTING BUT NOT FAR FROM RESTAURANTS AND STORES.
You drive to Kenova or Huntington ,WV. Ashland,Ky or Louisa, Ky. in APPROX - 10-15 minutes.
There are 2  Walmart stores 10-15 minutes drive also.

PLENTY OF PARKING BUT THE DRIVEWAY IS GRAVEL AND SOMETIMES GETS MUDDY

MY BROTHER LIVES IN THE LOG HOUSE ACROSS THE STREET IF YOU HAVE A EMERGENCY PROBLEM

sectionedDescription/access: Rest assured, there is ample parking available on-site to accommodate both vehicles and boats. Whether you're arriving with multiple vehicles or bringing along your boat for a day on the lake, you'll have no trouble finding a convenient and secure parking space right at the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience tranquility and convenience at this idyllic destination near Yatesville Lake and Marina. Perfect for avid anglers, this cabin is a mere 1.2 miles away from the lake, offering easy access to fishing adventures. With the capacity to comfortably accommodate 6-7 guests, it features two separate entrances. Enjoy the outdoors on two inviting balconies. Ample onsite parking is available for both your vehicle and boat. Linens, towels, and essential amenities are provided for a seamless stay.

Indulge in the warm ambiance of this charming cabin, where you'll be greeted with a delightful welcome basket filled with goodies to enhance your stay. Adding to its charm, the cabin is adorned with portraits from the Wild Turkey Federation. 

For your entertainment, a large screen projector is available for use, and it can be provided to you free of charge upon request prior to your booking. Please note that while the projector is available, a dedicated screen is not provided.

Rest assured, there is ample parking available on-site to accommodate both vehicles and boats. Whether you're arriving with multiple vehicles or bringing along your boat for a day on the lake, you'll have no trouble finding a convenient and secure parking space right at the property.

While I won't be physically present on-site, I'll be readily available to assist you through messaging. In case you need immediate assistance, there's a convenient option for you to reach me. Simply press the ring doorbell, and I'll be alerted promptly. Through the ring device, we can establish direct communication, allowing me to address your needs and concerns without delay.

Immerse yourself in a serene country setting while enjoying the convenience of being located near both the lake and town. This ideal location offers the best of both worlds, allowing you to experience the tranquility of the countryside while having easy access to the nearby lake for outdoor activities and the town for any necessities or attractions you may desire.

Rest assured, there is ample parking available on-site to accommodate both vehicles and boats. Whether you're arriving with multiple vehicles or bringing along your boat for a day on the lake, you'll have no trouble finding a convenient and secure parking space right at the property.

Upon your arrival, you will be provided with a starter supply of amenities including K-cups, paper towels, toilet paper, body wash, shampoo, and more. Additionally, a fresh bag of ice awaits you in the freezer, ensuring your beverages stay cool. As a valued repeat guest, you have the opportunity to receive a $25 cash back refund. Simply notify me either through a comment or message, and kindly leave a review after your stay. It's a straightforward process! 

If you're a couple and will be utilizing only one bedroom, you may qualify for a reduced housekeeping fee. Normally, cleaning rates are based on the entire house, but in your case, the rate can be adjusted accordingly. Once you've departed and the housekeeping team confirms that checkout rules were followed, you will receive a refund for the reduced rate, making your stay even more budget-friendly.

For your entertainment, a large screen projector is available for use, and it can be provided to you free of charge upon request prior to your booking. Please note that while the projector is available, a dedicated screen is not provided.
sectionedDescription/summary: Experience tranquility and convenience at this idyllic destination near Yatesville Lake and Marina. Perfect for avid anglers, this cabin is a mere 1.2 miles away from the lake, offering easy access to fishing adventures. With the capacity to comfortably accommodate 6-7 guests, it features two separate entrances. Enjoy the outdoors on two inviting balconies. Ample onsite parking is available for both your vehicle and boat. Linens, towels, and essential amenities are provided for a seamless stay.
sectionedDescription/transit: Rest assured, there is ample parking available on-site to accommodate both vehicles and boats. Whether you're arriving with multiple vehicles or bringing along your boat for a day on the lake, you'll have no trouble finding a convenient and secure parking space right at the property.

additionalHouseRules:
Renter is responsible for food spills, drink spills, and breakage.
Bands, dance, and/or DJs must stop one hour before the end of your rental period to allow for the clean-up hour. Music for all events must conclude at 12:00 AM regardless of prepaid overtime. Music should be kept at appropriate levels.
Unfortunately throwing rice or other substances at the bride and groom, though traditional, presents an environmental hazard. Please look into other options that are eco-friendly.
Children are welcome at Cornerstone Lodge. However, it is your responsibility to see that they are supervised.
Smoking is allowed outside only and designated ashtrays must be used. Please keep in mind that nicotine is toxic to plants and cigarettes extinguished in flowerbed and pots can kill the plants.
Renters are not allowed in maintenance rooms nor are they allowed in staff only rooms.
There will be no running or diving in or around the pool. There will not be a lifeguard provided and it is the Renters responsibility to ensure proper safety procedures are followed
No smoking in the lodge, when smoking please use the designated area on the porch only.
Please do not throw cigarettes or trash in the yard.

primaryHost/about: We are proud owners of Cornerstone Lodge @ Four Seasons Resort.
sectionedDescription/access: Plenty of parking for you and your guest!
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in the heart of our 560-acre retreat, Cornerstone Lodge is our first addition to Four Seasons Resort. Cornerstone is a perfect picture of rustic elegance filled with adventure and romance. Imagine celebrating your next event in style and luxury.  We have room for 18-30 guests (depending on sleeping arrangements) to stay comfortably at our lodge, and we have rollaway beds for up to 5 more guests!  Plenty of parking for you and your guest!  Someone will always be available to assist you if needed.  Close to both Charleston and Huntington, but chances are you will not want to leave!
The Cornerstone Lodge features ten ensuite themed rooms, each with its own unique style and decor. Click "VIEW MORE" to see sleeping arrangments:
2nd Floor 
Time Passages – 1 Queen 
Spring Fever – 1 Queen 
Winter Wonderland – 1 Queen
Autumn Leaves – Bunk beds (1 full bottom, twin top) 
Kissin on Bourbon – 1 Queen 
Whole New World – 1 King (Whole New World includes large bridal dressing room) 
3rd Floor 
Gypsy – 1 Full  
Dream Weaver – 1 Queen (private sitting area) 
Summer Breeze – 2 Queen
Lower Level 
Tennessee Whiskey – 1 Queen (Large dressing room and next to game room)

We have room for 22 people to stay comfortably at our lodge, and we have rollaway beds for up to 6 more guests!

Plenty of parking for you and your guest!

Someone will always be available to assist you if needed.

Close to both Charleston and Huntington but chances are you will not want to leave! Private in the heart of 560 acres of woods

name: The "Highlander" Rustic Yurt
primaryHost/about:
Rustic Ravines is the perfect getaway
Nestled in the foothills of the Allegheny Mountains, Rustic Ravines cabin rentals is West Virginia’s Ideal escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Our cabins sit on 300 acres of wooded paradise and are surrounded by 50,000 acres of private and public ATV trails, and other activities as diverse as kayaking, archery, fishing, hunting and golf. Our cabin rental facilities are ideal for events of all kinds. We’re located in Genoa, West Virginia, 27 miles south of Huntington and the Ohio River.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: They will have access to all of the property; approximately 300 acres to hike and explore and enjoy!
sectionedDescription/description:
Our Highlander Yurt is an extremely unique structure. An Octagonal Yurt made from trees that were harvested from the property. Our pictures tell you a lot and give you an intriguing glimpse, but you will still be blown away when you see the structure in person. The 8 main support logs are great Ash Trees that were harvested from the property because they were dying. The metal roof is a Corn Bin Roof that provides a 20' high dome in the center

The space is an open floor plan and has many cool design features. A 65" TV with free WIFI and equipped with an Amazon Fire Stick for your viewing pleasure.  The Highlander has a very large U-shaped bar that doubles as a dining area/gathering space. And don't forget to check out the jacuzzi on the back deck ;)

They will have access to all of the property; approximately 300 acres to hike and explore and enjoy!

We do have ATV rentals available if you'd like to cruise around the area on a Side-by-side ;)

primaryHost/about: I’m a lifelong learner, artist/photographer/network marketer and energetic Gramie to 11 exceptional grandlittles. Retired from teaching high school art & biology, I now divide my time between travel, affiliate marketing, teaching private lessons (both in person and online) and hosting short term guests in my studio.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access:
You’ll have access to the whole space, with the exception of the following:
 - two locked closet areas.
 - photography props and art materials stored along the tops of all built in structures.

Check in 3pm. Keypad access code will be sent the week of your stay, prior to arrival. 

Check out 10 am.
sectionedDescription/description:
Peggie’s Studio Retreat is nestled in a secluded hollow just minutes from the Bearwallow Trailhead of the Hatfields & McCoys’ Trail System. 

The space is a large art/photography studio that has been transformed into an inviting living space. You’ll love the peace and quiet after a day on the trails. 

Buy your official Hatfield - McCoyTrail Permit on site. Trail maps provided with permit purchase. 

(Let Peggie know you want to purchase Trail Passes when you book the studio.)

Get away from everything when you stay at Peggie’s Studio Retreat. The studio is away from dusty, noisy, congested campgrounds and outside city limits.

A clean stream runs beside the studio; nestled between mountains on all sides. Be disturbed by nothing but the sights and sounds of nature. 

 You’ll experience the peace and tranquility of rural Southern West Virginia, while still being minutes away from the main attractions you are here to enjoy.

Not a Trail Rider, just looking for a peaceful getaway? We’ve got you covered.

You’ll have access to the whole space, with the exception of the following:
 - two locked closet areas.
 - photography props and art materials stored along the tops of all built in structures.

Check in 3pm. Keypad access code will be sent the week of your stay, prior to arrival. 

Check out 10 am.

Need to contact Peggie? Use the airBnB app for fastest response.

Welcome to “Head of the Holler” living, where peaceful coexistence between nature and neighbors is paramount. We live by the Live and Let Live Principle… aka The Golden Rule. You might not see another person during your stay, but deer and other wildlife are plentiful.

Park on a gravel parking lot, large enough for your truck and trailer. Leave the trailer behind and ride your UTV to the trails.

Vacation cabin (800 SF), secluded on 300 acre farm, hiking trails, wildlife viewing, 3 fishing ponds, 2 picnic areas, great scenery located in hills of eastern Kentucky. Fully furnished with wood burning fireplace, 1 bunk bed, 1  Queen Size  bed/mattress, (sleeps 4). Nightly.

Available year round.

Located within 10 miles of Yatesville Lake State Park and within 4 miles of downtown Louisa, KY.

name: Sacred Winds - Yatesville Lake Luxury Cabin Rental
photos/0/caption: Sacred Winds, Kentucky's #1 Rated Private Vacation Rental. Nestled in the hills of Eastern KY is this premium vacation cabin rental.
photos/1/caption: Escape and Explore, find out why families and couples love returning to Sacred Winds.  Yatesville Lake State Park is the hidden gem of Appalachia.
photos/2/caption: Luxury filled private cabin rental at Yatesville Lake State Park in Louisa, KY.
photos/3/caption: Chosen as the highest rated romantic cabin getaway in Kentucky, Sacred Winds has all the amenities the Smoky Mountians offers without the crowds.
photos/4/caption: Over 250 5 Star reviews.  The Boggs Family love sharing their personal vacation home.  How about watching the big game while in the hot tub or with an evening fire?
photos/5/caption: All the amenities you would ever dream of. Netflix and Youtube Live TV.  This rustic modern decor provides the comforts of home with a remote relaxation that will keep you coming back.
photos/6/caption: One of the most talked about highlights is the fully stocked kitchen.  We've left it all behind for you.  We've had a family have Thanksgiving dinner here 3 years in a row.
photos/7/caption: Georgy is our Caribou who watches over Sacred Winds.  The high ceiling A frame cabin has a grand entrance feeling.  Altough its rented everyday, the May Family does a great job of keeping it exceptionally clean.
photos/8/caption: Its a vacation home from one end to the other.  Everything about Sacred Winds is meant to give you the escape your looking for.
photos/9/caption: View from the staircase.  Lots of open room to move around and relax.  You'll love how much natural light flows through the home.
photos/10/caption: Whether its just two of you on a romantic getaway or a family looking to explore, this cabin has all that you're looking for.
photos/11/caption: Comfort matters to choosing the right vacation home.  After a good day of hiking or being on the lake, you have plenty of room to spread out.
photos/12/caption: Welcome to Mom and Dad's vacation.  The upstairs master bedroom houses a custom made king size amish bed.
photos/13/caption: Sacred Winds Chief Bedroom has its own private balcony.  Our guests enjoy early morning coffee as the dew rises off the mountains.
photos/14/caption: An electric fireplace sets the ambiance, while a nice reading rocker is there for that book you've wanted to read.
photos/15/caption: Sacred Winds has all the technology.  This smart tv has Youtube Live TV and Netflix for your evening movies, sports and binge watching shows.
photos/16/caption: Two chairs, because our kids are still asleep downstairs in their own bedroom.
photos/17/caption: Everything the best cabins in Pigeon Forge have, minus the crowds.  Our additional landing invites additional space to move around.
photos/18/caption: Enjoy our custom made arcade table with over 400 vintage arcade games.  Yes its 2 players.  Fun for all ages, including the couple celebrating their 25 year wedding anniversary.
photos/19/caption: Enjoy our arcade table on the open landing.  Fun for all ages.
photos/20/caption: Our custom made day bed sleeps two with a slide out trundle.
photos/21/caption: French glass doors shed natural sunlight into the master bedroom.  Pull the blinds and lock the door for privacy.
photos/22/caption: New in 2021 is a 40" Smart TV on a motion swivel for the bunkbed room.  It has Youtube Live TV and Netflix.  Most of our guests log on with their Apps like Disney+, Hulu and Peacock as well.
photos/23/caption: First floor bedroom with queen size amish made bunkbeds.  Good for kids and adults.  Each bed has a tempur-pedic mattress.
photos/24/caption: Our golfing stay and play groups love having such large beds all to themselves.  Great room for families to put all the kids.
photos/25/caption: Large first floor bathroom with plenty of room.
photos/26/caption: First floor washer and dryer for your use.  Go home with all clean clothes.
photos/27/caption: Wrap around porch with swing.  One of the favorite things mentioned in our 5 star reviews is morning and evening on the porch swing.
photos/28/caption: New in 2020 is the massive covered porch with an outdoor tv and Hot Springs spa.  Bring your relaxation outdoors no matter the weather.
photos/29/caption: Wood campfire with log chairs for your evening fire.  Park-like charcoal grill is in the background.
photos/30/caption: This is where people usually stop looking at the pictures and just book their stay.
photos/31/caption: One our guests favorite things to do is watch tv while being in the hot tub.
photos/32/caption: Early spring photo from one of our guests.
photos/33/caption: Over 3 acres of roaming room.  A few small walking paths to get you warmed up for the State Park hiking.
photos/34/caption: Over 1,700 sq ft of large cabin openness.  4 bar stools at the granite counter and 6 seats at the dining table.
photos/35/caption: Plenty of counter top space makes it comfortable for vacation.  Lots of cabinets to put your food.
photos/36/caption: Looing out over the landing balcony shows the layout of a portion of the living room.
photos/37/caption: Large table seats up to 6.  Fun for board games, cards and story time.
photos/38/caption: Our cabin guests love nature.  Whether its fishing, hiking or simply relaxing, Eastern KY has it all for you.
photos/39/caption: You can find hiking maps from the State Park, the Dam & Marina called the Mary Ingles trail system or find all the virgin trails around the lake.
photos/40/caption: People love trying to find this rock cliff at Yatesville Lake.  A hidden gem and fun to climb and jump.
photos/41/caption: Rent a pontoon boat or bring your own.  Yatesville Lake is a long and adventerous lake.
photos/42/caption: Sunset at one of the beaches at Yatesville Lake.  There is a small beach at the Lawrence County Campground and a beach near the Marina.  You can also look up The Cove at Yatesville Lake for things to do.
photos/43/caption: Eagle's Ridge at Yatesville Lake State Park was ranked as the #3 public course by Golf Digest.
photos/44/caption: Every year we have guests from Canada, Michigan, Wisconsin and New York who stay at Sacred Winds because they love Eagle's Ridge and other nearby Golf Courses.
photos/45/caption: We have several avid kayakers who stay at our family cabin every year.  They say it would take over a week to explore all of Yatesville Lake.  You also have Paintsville, Grayson and East Lynn Lakes nearby.
photos/46/caption: Rush Offroad is only 30 minutes away.  If you're real adventerous you can also enjoy The Hatfield & McCoy trails or drive down to Mine Made Adventure Park.
photos/47/caption: Public hunting land around Yatesville Lake is well known for turkey, squirrel and deer.  You might even run into a small black bear.
photos/48/caption: Yatesville Lake Dam is a great place to explore.  With plenty of roaming room, you can see what the United State Army Corp of Engineers built in 1988.  There is a Welcome facility with maps and information.
photos/49/caption: There is plenty of information online about Yatesville Lake State Park.  You can find hiking maps, information about the mulitple boat ramps, get boat rentals at the Marina (call way in advance).
photos/50/caption: Our guests never get bored.  Eastern KY offers plenty to do without the crowds of the Smoky Mountains.
photos/51/caption: The Boggs Family takes great pride in sharing their private vacation home with guests like you.
primaryHost/about: The Boggs family is offering their private vacation home nestled in the hills of Eastern Kentucky at Yatesville Lake State Park.  We take great pride in offering a luxurious cabin rental for your vacation, anniversary, golfing, fishing and hiking getaway.  You'll be pleased with your stay, just check out the pictures.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest access to the cabin will be a unique numeric password sent.  Just push the code into the front door to gain access.
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Sacred Winds, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.
Located in a secluded hillside this cabin is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just a romantic getaway.

Welcome to Sacred Winds, a secluded and luxurious private cabin rental by owner at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.  The open cabin feel invites you to sit back and relax away from it all.

The #1 Cabin Rental in Eastern Kentucky. Our personal vacation home is a premium cabin rental that sleeps up to 10 guests and features all high end furniture, appliances and electronics. Sitting on the side of a picturesque mountain top within Yatesville Lake State Park in Louisa, KY, this 2,000 square foot vacation lodge is perfect for your fishing, golfing, family or just romantic getaway vacation.  

This year around vacation home is a popular stay and play at the famous Eagle Ridge Golf Course at Yatesville Lake State Park in Eastern Kentucky.  The Sacred Winds cabin is also a favorite for Romantic Getaways, family vacations or a small retreat.

Sacred Winds Cabin Amenities include:

Indoors - A breath-taking stone electric fireplace, 2 bedrooms and 1 bath, Amish made Cedar Log Queen & Full Bunk Beds with Tempur-Pedic mattresses, Flexsteel leather sectional and executive chair and ottoman, Amish made Cedar dining table and chairs for 8, black granite kitchen countertops and bar with 4 Amish made log barstools, stainless steel appliances, upscale washer and dryer, 60 inch Smart TV with Roku, Netflix and Youtube Live TV, Master Suite king size log bed with balcony, 50 inch HD TV with Netflix and YouTube Live TV, loft area with log daybed and trundle, Mame Arcade System with old arcade and nintendo games, one large full bathroom and a half bath in the master bedroom, and of course we have high speed fiber internet access with a wireless router...... and this is only what's on the inside.  

Outdoors:  Large wrap around porch with rocking chairs, back patio with seating and a wood fire pit, park-like charcoal grill, over 3 acres of roaming room and the adventures of a life time with Yatesville Lake State Park.

This cabin is nestled in a wooded niche on a very secluded hill. This luxury cabin will resemble the best that the Smoky Mountains or Hocking Hills has to offer and it's all hear in Eastern Kentucky.

* Rates are based on 2-4 guests.  To keep the costs low we do not charge a larger rate for only 4 guests.  $15 per additional guests is 40% lower than the average cabin rental.  Our cabin is comparable to a $325 a night cabin in the Smoky Mountains.

What you need to bring:
Your own food, shampoos and soap.  Food.  
Walmart is 5 miles away in Louisa just off Route 23.
Only 1 hour away from Carter Caves.
Bring firewood for outdoor fire pit.
Non-Smoking, preferably no pets.

Things to Do:
Golf - Nationally Recognized Eagle Ridge Golf Course.

Hiking - Yatesville Lake State Park is home to the infamous Mary Ingels Trail 3.5 Miles.

ATV Riding - Eastern Kentucky is famous for back country ATV riding including the famous Hatfield & McCoy trails. This cabin is about an hour from a Trail Head of Hatfield & McCoy.

Fishing - Some of the best bass fishing in the country is located 1 mile from this cabin. Fish 26 miles of Yatesville Lake, bring your boat.

Horseback Riding at Yatesville Lake State Park.

We look forward to sharing our personal retreat cabin with you and your friends and family.

Guest access to the cabin will be a unique numeric password sent.  Just push the code into the front door to gain access.

Your stay will be completely private.  We do have a security system and will only check the recording if something is damaged or we believe there were more guests on the premises than the rental eluded to.

The Ced Gap development is located just 1 mile from the entrance of the Yatesville Lake State Park.  There are neighbors, however most of them only use the cabins as weekend retreats.  This cabin is nestled on a hillside and is private.

Sacred Winds and our Sister Cabin Heaven's Porch are the only 5 Star Cabin Rentals in Eastern Kentucky.  Book with confidence, you will not be disappointed.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: We expect our guests to take care of our private vacation homes.  Our home is not for parties or events.  Most of our guests travel from out of state to stay at our cabin.  We take great pride in offering our home at an affordable price to adult and mature guests.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Your stay will be completely private.  We do have a security system and will only check the recording if something is damaged or we believe there were more guests on the premises than the rental eluded to.

name: Heavens Porch - Eastern KY Luxury Cabin Rental
photos/0/caption: Private cabin rental at Yatesville Lake State Park boasts some of the most amazing views in all of Kentucky. Heaven's Porch has 2 large bedrooms, 1.5 baths and sleeps up to 7 people. The romantic cabin getaway has a great lake view on 170 acres.
photos/1/caption: One of the things our guest love most about Heaven's Porch is the serenity of the location.  Knestled in the hills, you'll enjoy the lost art of porch time.
photos/2/caption: Private cabin rental at Yatesville Lake State Park boasts some of the most amazing views in all of Kentucky.  Heaven's Porch has 2 large bedrooms, 1.5 baths and sleeps up to 7 people.  The romantic cabin getaway has a seasonal lake view and sits on 170 acres of Appalachian hills.  All that the Smoky Mountains, Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg would offer in a cabin rental at half the price.
photos/3/caption: Front porch hot tub with amazing views and easy access.  Watch the sunset from the best view Eastern KY has to offer.
photos/4/caption: Enjoy an evening fire as the sunset on your lake view.  With the State of Kentucky owning almost all of the land around the Lake, this is one of the few properties that have a seasonal lake view.  The water is drawn back by the Dam in the winter.
photos/5/caption: Modern Rustic design includes a reclaimed tobacco barn wood Kentucky state, custom made rustic cedar furniture throughout.
photos/6/caption: Authentic leather Dexter Club chair and ottoman from Lazyboy.  Great place to take a nap.
photos/7/caption: Open space makes for great entertaining and relaxation space.  Lots of natural sun light fills the living room.
photos/8/caption: Watch the big game with friends.
photos/9/caption: Whether its a couple celebrating their anniversary or a family wanting to relax.  We've got it all here for you.
photos/10/caption: This cabin is ALL wood.  Lay down on the couch, take a nap, watch tv, talk to your lovely wife.
photos/11/caption: Board games, arcade table, plenty of things to do for the kids.
photos/12/caption: All the room you would want.
photos/13/caption: Comfort equals high quality furniture.  Our guests love the high end leather couches we provide.
photos/14/caption: Dream cabin kitchen, fully stocked. Modern rustic design built in 2018.  Open and spacious with every detail thought of for your vacation stay.
photos/15/caption: Knotty hickory cabinets, granite stone counter tops, stainless appliances, rustic cedar island, fully stocked with all your needs to cook and eat a Thanksgiving meal!
photos/16/caption: Custom rustic bar height table seats 6.
photos/17/caption: Open cabin concept makes entertaining easy.
photos/18/caption: Handmade rustic cedar island with custom stools.
photos/19/caption: First floor full bath with laundry available for our guests.
photos/20/caption: Master bedroom boast plenty of natural sunlight, an arcade table and a private 2nd story porch with lakeviews.
photos/21/caption: High speed WiFi connected to all the smart tv's in the cabin.
photos/22/caption: Plenty of room in the Master Bedroom.  43" 4k Smart TV with cable, Netflix and Amazon Prime for late night movies from the comfort of your bed.
photos/23/caption: Romantic getaways, Anniversary gifts and honeymoons are favorites here at Heaven's Porch.
photos/26/caption: This bedroom sleeps up to 5 with a daybed and trundle and an additional trundle under the queen size bed.
photos/27/caption: You'll enjoy the craftsmanship of the rustic cedar wood throughout the cabin.
photos/28/caption: Easy access to half bath on the second floor, creatively decorated.
photos/29/caption: Private patio fire pit with custom made wood furniture with lake and mountain view.
photos/30/caption: Lots of open spaces.  Why guests are giving us nothing but a 5 star rating!
photos/31/caption: 3-4 person hot tub, but best for just 2.  The best Anniversary or Romantic getaway you could dream of.
photos/32/caption: Walk to fish the lake or just gaze.  Rent our kayaks and walk across the country road to find some of the best kayaking around.
photos/33/caption: Privacy cabin retreat gives you all the relaxation you've been looking for.
photos/34/caption: The sunset is the best.  It reminds you what is important.
photos/35/caption: Call it home for a week and you wont want to leave.
photos/36/caption: Heaven's Porch where time slows down and you can breath.  The luxury cabin rental you can afford.  From our family to yours, its all there to escape and explore.
photos/37/caption: Of course there is a swing.
photos/38/caption: Take a nap on the wicker couch.
photos/39/caption: Grab a coffee and watch the sunrise.
photos/40/caption: Grill out on the back patio.  Hot tub now on the front porch overlooking the lake and mountains.
photos/42/caption: Plenty to do in Eastern KY.
photos/46/caption: Ranked #3 public course in the US by Golf Digest.
photos/50/caption: Find the hidden gems of Eastern KY.

sectionedDescription/access: The entire home is accessible to our guests.  There is a Ring doorbell near the front door and a Ring spotlight camera on the back porch.
sectionedDescription/description:
Beautiful cottage with new bathroom, kitchen, flooring, windows, and located on a quiet dead-end street that is just steps from a walking/running path along the river.  Marshall University is less than a 15 minute drive.  There are queen beds and TVs in both bedrooms.  The WiFi is fast enough to work remotely, streaming, and gaming.  The house has keyless entry and plenty of towels/toiletries.   Washer and dryer are newer units. This house is close to both Huntington, WV and Ashland, KY.

The kitchen is bright and fresh with new cabinets and appliances.  The bathroom was also updated with new tub, faucets, vanity, etc.  There is a television in the living room, as well as both bedrooms, to allow all guests to enjoy their entertainment together or separately. There are 2 additional parking places in the back of the property accessible from the alley.   The concrete is slightly above ground level and most suitable for a SUV or truck.

The entire home is accessible to our guests.  There is a Ring doorbell near the front door and a Ring spotlight camera on the back porch.

We are available by email or phone to help answer any questions.  Thomas is our local contact and available in person if needed.

Westmoreland is a quiet suburb of Huntington.   The walking path at the end of the road is well maintained and a nice escape from the city.

The downtown area is a short drive and Uber/Lyft are also available.  The Huntington Tri-State airport is about a 10 minute drive from the home.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
quiet time from 10pm - 8am
Duvet covers in bedrooms are $50 charge if stained 
Pet fee is $25 
Smoking, vaping, and burning incense are prohibited on property.  Guests will have reservations canceled and be charged full damage deposit for violating our strict no smoking policy.
